abstract: OWN: The Oprah Winfrey Network, announced Friday that the head of that channel, Christina Norman, had been dismissed.
snippet: OWN: The Oprah Winfrey Network, announced Friday that the head of that channel, Christina Norman, had been dismissed.
lead_paragraph: 9:17 p.m. | Updated |  Dissatisfied by the first ratings report cards for OWN, Oprah Winfrey and her business partner, Discovery Communications, said on Friday that they had dismissed the four-month-old channel’s chief executive, Christina Norman.

headline.main: Christina Norman Dismissed as Chief of OWN
